response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $10,000 to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. To make this proposition attractive, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, providing you with an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a favorable price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
